Introduction

W.D, also known as Seungyong, is a South Korean dancer and rapper under Kyuri Entertainment. He is the main rapper of the boy group N.CUS.
He announced the change of his stage name from W.D to Seungyong on November 6th, 2019
His brother is Junyong of Noir.

On November 6, 2023 on Like a Movie's instagram they revealed two new members and updated line-up showing Seungyong as a new member going by the stage name Gyeom
